resources.string: The file(%s) can not be removed.
The file(%s) can not be saved.
The file(%s) can not be opened.
Press the \' Back \' button once again to exit.
Please name include numbers, letters, and underbar(_).
Detect modified contents. Do you want to save it?
Are you sure you want to delete the folder?
Are you sure you want to delete the file?
This program is affected by the \"GNU GPL v3 License \" license.
This file goes over 1 MB. Would you like to open it?
Changing Font size affects only the note screen.
Report the bug to the developer.
The default folder can not be removed.
By default, you\'ll see notes in the default folder when you run OpenPad.\nYou can call up the other folders by pressing the Folder button.

You can add a new note by pressing the \" Add button (+) \" at the bottom right-hand corner of the main screen.\nNote that these additional notes can be stored in the default folder (OpenPad/Basic) of the application and stored on the external path.

You can delete the corresponding notes in the main notes by pressing them for more than 1 second.\nDelete will also be deleted from the actual mobile phone memory when deleted.\n(You can not restore it again.)

Displays the folder in the folder (OpenPad) of the application.\nThe default folder (OpenPad) can not be deleted and will be recreated if it is erased.\nFolders list consist of \" Default Folder \", \" External File Explorer \" and newly created folders.

If you run an application \" More than once \", it automatically creates a folder called \" OpenPad \", which creates a default folder for \" Basic \" folders.\nThis folder does not delete the \" Deleted \" function from the \" OpenPad \" feature, and will be recreated again if it is deleted.\n(Note that notes can not be recovered when deleted.)
You can add folders by pressing the \" Add Folder \" button on the top right.\nThe name of the folder can not be duplicated and can not create a folder called \" Basic \".

Like delete memo, you can delete it by pressing the corresponding folder for more than 1 second.\nIf you delete a folder, all the notes in the folder will be deleted.\n(However, the default folder and file explorer can not be deleted.)

Allows you to retrieve files (. txt) from a path other than the default folder (OpenPad).\nHowever, all files imported from an external file explorer are imported temporarily into \"EUC-KR → UTF-8\".\nSo, if you leave the memo window, there is no change in the change, even if there are no changes.

The maximum length of the letter is unspecified.\n\" Up to 500,000 characters in English, \" and \" 250,000 characters in Korean letters, \" will be saved.\nHowever, if you pass beyond this, you will not be able to guarantee stability.
Color color is not supported for \"after update list\".\nInstead, the theme updates are scheduled to be included with the theme.

Press the " Edit button " on the top right to enter the correction mode.
Once you have modified it, press and hold the " Save button " button on the top right.
The file will then be stored in the " UTF-8 " format.
(However, if the open file is over 500 KB, it can not be edited.)
Press the \" Open Folder \" button on the top left corner to view the notes contained in that folder.
Color files in an external file explorer

There are three colors in a file.
Red : Opening files does not guarantee stability (over 1 MB or more)
Yellow : File is opened but a little slower (500 KB or more files)
Black : File files that ensure file opening (500 KB files)
(MB = 1024 KB)
Exit to acquire permission.\n(Please restart after shutdown.)
If you don\'t have permission, you won\'t be able to use it.
Thank you for your first use.\nPlease check \" Help \".\n(Setup - Help)
If you like this program, visit my homepage.\n(http://eskeptor.tistory.com)
